title: Plot Forest Hist Grad Boosting Comparison
description: In this lab, we will compare the performance of two popular ensemble models, Random Forest (RF) and Histogram Gradient Boosting (HGBT), for a regression dataset in terms of score and computation time. We will vary the parameters that control the number of trees according to each estimator and plot the results to visualize the trade-off between elapsed computing time and mean test score.

meta.title: Comparing Random Forest and Histogram Gradient Boosting for Regression
meta.description: Explore the performance of ensemble models for a regression dataset, analyzing score and computation time.
meta.keywords: machine learning, computation time, histogram gradient boosting, ensemble models, scikit-learn, machine learning playground, random forest, scikit-learn playground, regression
